lines: Oh, and thanks for playing with us today.
I'm not actually that good at football...
But seeing you play, whether you were good or trash...
My team's never been nice to me.
They think I suck at football, which is kinda true.
When you joined, I was about to do the same to you.
But I didn't. I never wanted to be a bully.
It was easier to shift my hatred towards others.
You're pretty much the only "friend" that I know.
So... are you gonna bully me?
Okay. Thank you. I have to go home.
